sentences.sContent: What are your plans for the future?
The islands should have the right to decide their own future.
sentences.sCn: 这些岛屿应当有权决定自己的未来。

sentences.sContent: a leader who will shape the organization’s future
sentences.sCn: 将决定该组织未来的一位领导者

sentences.sContent: ...Leah started playing with future possibilities by exploring her interests and developing new capabilities...
...the future of the market looks far from rosy...
...the Netherlands completed a 229-foot long bike path paved with solar panels as a test for future projects...
...And involving the future resident in the process can be very important...
...but we want to save them for future years...
...investors' bets that a company will do even better in the future because of innovation...

...The pervasive undervaluation on elementary skills that we find among current students and even some teachers can largely be attributed to their lack of vision of future and thorough understanding on the knowledge...
...It is worth mentioning that those seemingly basic and elementary skills we learned in school actually play a significantly indispensable role in our future works...
...Peering into the future, the sharing economy is a little like online shopping...
...Making ethical decisions is a critical part of avoiding future problems...

phrases.pCn: 未来的发展前景，未来发展
光明的未来，光明的前途
n. 发展前景；光明的前途

words.tran: 没有前途的；没有希望的
未来主义者；未来派画家
